オプション1: The three gathered in Trapezoid Man's room.
"... Today, I made a contract with a demon."

"If I hadn't, I would have died. I had no choice but to accept it.
In exchange for reviving once from death, I'll die in a year."
(...I feel like I messed this up... How should I have said it...?)
"Ha... haah."
Trapezoid Man and the others couldn't process the sudden news.

"When I was about to die from a monster attack,
a horned person appeared and urged me to make a contract. I had to accept."
Star Man produced flame from his hand.
"As proof of the pact with the demon, I can use magic."
"I want our goal to be escaping this island within a year."
"Uh... no... there's no way..."

Trapezoid Man couldn't grasp it right away,
but the children accepted it immediately.

After that, while eating acorns, they talked about the horned person,
the ghost, the magic, and the small vials.
"Right. I brought a piece of a monster."
Star Man took out a leaf and opened it. Everyone peered in.
"It smells like a factory... Feels like it'll make you sick..."
All three of them grimaced.
"Tomorrow I'll look for acorns and also check if there are any islands nearby."
"Got it. I... sorry, but there's nothing I can do..."

"It's okay, don't worry.
I'll have Triangle Man and Square Man gather coconuts."
"Okay."
"Throw stones at the coconuts to knock them down, then collect them."
"Okay!"
"Be very careful."
"They hit people's heads a lot, right (laughs)."
[Check NPC status.]

[If any status reaches 0, the NPC dies.]
[If hydration reaches 90 remaining, they die.]
[If you put ingredients in Storage, they'll be consumed as needed.]
